entry: sleeper :non-mage
marauder : insane mage
nephandi AKA fallen one : corrupted servant of nightmares
quintessence : magical resource fuels magic
sanctum AKA chantry : mage safehouse & pocket reality & safe from paradox
acolyte : non-mage servant of mage believes magic

too much paradox : magical backlash consequence breaking reality it caused by vulgar spells subtle spell : safer to cast& magical yet appears mundanevulgar spell : creates paradox& obviously arcane/ bizarre/ unnatural

Technocracy : union of science based mage magic through science their goal conceal magic eliminate supernatural they 5 divisions : 1 Syndicate| 2 'Iteration X'| 3 'New World Order'| 4 Progenitors| 5 'Void Engineers'
Syndicate : Technocratic division of businessmen / mobsters who manipulate reality through money & finance
'Iteration X' : Technocratic division of cyborg enforcers equipped future tech weapons
'New World Order' AKA NWO : Technocratic division of leaders / visionaries can command mortal authorities mind control
Progenitors : Technocratic division of magical biological science advanced medicine & mutation
'Void Engineers' : Technocratic division of space & dimensional exploration and protection
casting magic requires flourish using gadget/gesture/item/act/phrase/song/music
7 spheres of magical control : 1 Connection | 2 Entropy | 3 Energy | 4 Life | 5 Matter | 6 Mind | 7 Time

'The Traditions' : Alliance of 7 magical traditions devoted individualism& enlightenment they 7 traditions : 1 Euthanatos | 2 'Virtual Adepts' | 3 'Akashic Brotherhood' | 4 'Celestial Chorus' | 5 'Cult of Ecstasy' | 6 'Order of Hermes' | 7 Verbena
Euthanatos : assassin/death/chaos tradition mage primary sphere entropy
Ecstatic : member of 'Cult of Ecstasy' tantric/transcendent/musican/altered state tradition mage primary sphere time
choirister : member of 'Celestial Chorus' Abrahamic/religious tradition mage primary sphere matter
Akashic : member 'Akashic Brotherhood' martial artist/monk/ascetic tradition mage primary sphere mind
hermetic : member 'Order of Hermes' occultist/achemist/prescriptive tradition mage primary sphere energy
Verbena : wiccan/naturist/shamanic tradition mage primary sphere life
'Virtual Adept' : reality hacker/gadgeteer tradition mage primary sphere connection
connection : sphere grants powers conjuration/distortion/scrying/teleportation/warding
entropy : sphere grants powers chaos/dissolution/fate/fortune/order
energy : sphere grants powers motion/fire/lightning/radiance/cold/physics/technology/weather
life : sphere grants powers cloning/creation/disease/evolution/healing/improvement/shapeshifting/wounding
mind : sphere grants powers astral travel/communication/illusion/mind-shielding/self-empowerment
time : sphere grants powers timelines/divination/time manipulation/travel
matter : sphere grants powers patterns/conjuration/shaping/transmutation
